Patent Information.Abstract: The present invention relates to a peptide comprising or consisting of a sequence of the formula A-B-C-D-E-F (formula I), wherein A is a peptide consisting of three to six basic amino acid residues; B is an amino acid residue or a peptide consisting of two amino acid residues, wherein said residue(s) are hydrophobic amino acid residues; C is a basic amino acid residue or is absent; D is a peptide consisting of two hydrophobic amino acid residues or is absent; E is a peptide consisting of two basic amino acid residues; and F is a peptide consisting of two hydrophobic amino acid residues; or a peptidomimetic thereof; wherein the basic amino acid residue is selected from the group consisting of arginine, lysine and histidine; wherein the hydrophobic amino acid residue is selected from the group consisting of leucine, alanine, valine, phenylalanine, isoleucine and methionine; and wherein said peptide or peptidomimetic has antimicrobial activity.
